servinfo.title: Transmission Warning Light Operation Check (Non-E-OBD Model)

s1.ptxt: Check that transmission warning light lights for about 2 – 4 sec. and then goes OFF. If anything faulty is found, advance Transmission Warning Light Circuit Check – Light Does Not Come “ON” at Ignition Switch ON (Non-E-OBD Model):5 A/T or Transmission Warning Light Circuit Check – Light Remains “ON” at Ignition Switch ON (Non-E-OBD Model):5 A/T .
